oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Special order for transfer of soldiers for return to United States
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. 1st class Emmett L. Moorer of Henning, Tennessee, is listed on page 5. Moorer had been serving on detached service with Co. B, 306th Amm. Train, 81st Div. alongside French colonial troops from Africa at Is-sur-Till, France. This special order provided that individual soldiers be grouped into informal companies for transport back to the United States.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
